DOC.brief_title: Use Abbott RealTime CT/NG Detect Chlamydia Trachomatis CT & Neisseria Gonorrhoeae NG Men Who Have Sex With Men MSM
DOC.detailed_description: For subject enrol study , follow clinical data information obtain : 1 ) reason exam , 2 ) subject 's sign symptom 3 ) clinical assessment . For subject enrol study , two clinician-collected pharyngeal swab , two clinician-collected rectal swab , first catch urine specimen ( approximately 25 ml ) obtain . The collection order clinician-collected swab randomize . Two pharyngeal swab test research laboratory use : 1 ) APTIMA COMBO 2® [ AC2 ] ( Gen-Probe Inc , San Diego , CA ) ; 2 ) Abbott RealTime CT/NG [ RealTime ] ( Abbott Molecular , Des Plains , IL ) . Two rectal swab test research laboratory use : 1 ) AC2 ; 2 ) RealTime . A first-catch urine [ FCU ] specimen split San Francisco Department Public Health laboratory send Chlamydia Research Laboratory analysis use : 1 ) AC2 ; 2 ) RealTime . All NAAT specimen collect manufacturer 's recommend NAAT transport medium . After specimen processing , sample freeze -70ºC discrepant analysis .
